name: Pumpkin Popper
description:
Enter the pumpkin patch, and destroy all the mutated pumpkin crops that has started to sprout! How many can you take down before the time runs out?

Pumpkin Popper is a game created in one month for Halloween on my spare time. Post mortem for the project will be available on my website when it is ready.

Controls
WASD / Arrow Keys  - move character
Mouse - Aim
Space - SLAM!

DISCLAIMER
Unreal Engine 4 does not support Mac builds unless they're built on a Mac machine. As I do not own a Mac, I could not make a build.
